name: Banpresto Dragon Ball Daima Gomah With Panel 13 Cm figure
description:
Unleash the Power of Dragon Ball with the BANPRESTO Daima Gomah Figure!

Step into the electrifying world of Dragon Ball with the incredible BANPRESTO Daima Gomah figure. This meticulously crafted 13cm figure captures the raw power and dynamic energy of Gomah, bringing a legendary character to life right before your eyes.

Experience the Legend:

This isn´t just a figure; it´s a statement. The BANPRESTO Daima Gomah figure embodies the spirit of Dragon Ball, showcasing Gomah in a powerful stance, ready to unleash his devastating attacks. Every detail, from the intricate sculpting of his muscles to the fierce expression on his face, has been painstakingly recreated to deliver an authentic Dragon Ball experience.

A Dynamic Addition to Your Collection:

Whether you´re a seasoned collector or just starting your Dragon Ball journey, the BANPRESTO Daima Gomah figure is a must-have. Its compact 13cm size makes it perfect for display on your shelf, desk, or in your display case. Imagine the envy in your friends´ eyes as they witness the sheer power emanating from this incredible figure.

The Perfect Gift for Dragon Ball Fans:

Know a Dragon Ball fanatic? Look no further! The BANPRESTO Daima Gomah figure is the ultimate gift for any fan of the iconic anime series. It´s a thoughtful present that captures the essence of Dragon Ball and is sure to be cherished for years to come.

Features:

* Officially licensed BANPRESTO product
* Highly detailed sculpt and paintwork
* Dynamic pose capturing Gomah´s power
* Perfect for display on shelves, desks, or in display cases

Technical Specifications:

* Height: 13cm
* Material: PVC

Bring home the power of Dragon Ball with the BANPRESTO Daima Gomah figure. Order yours today!
